title: 2022 Norco Range enduro bike rocks High Virtual Pivot suspension on 29″ wheels
content:
The 2022 Norco Range is entirely unrecognizable, redeveloped from the ground up with a new high virtual pivot suspension design. Such a grand departure from the Range of years gone by would’ve surely warranted a new name for this fast as hell looking 29er race machine. But, let’s not get hung up on nomenclature. Here […]

The post 2022 Norco Range enduro bike rocks High Virtual Pivot suspension on 29″ wheels appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
